00039 struct stmt;
00040 using namespace std;

00042         struct scope;

00045 #include "symtab.h"

00047         struct scope{
00048                 map<string,symtab_ent*> sym_tab;
00049                 scope() {
00050                         //cout << " constructing scope(): this: " << this << endl;
00051                 }
00052                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt/*, int line_no*/);
00053                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt, expr *e);
00054                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt, expr *e, type_qualifier tq);
00055                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt, int arr_size /*, int line_no*/);
00056                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt, int arr_size, /*int line_no,*/ char *text);
00057                 stmt* insert(const char * name, datatype dt, xtcc_set *lxs);

00059                                 vector<string>& pop_stack);
